doc: Set or clear checkpoints at which to pause and stop the script.

fields.doc: Timestamp when the Kafka message was created.
fields.name: kafka_timestamp

fields.doc: Checkpoint(s) at which to pause, as a regular expression. No checkpoints if blank; all checkpoints if ".*".
fields.name: pause

fields.doc: Checkpoint(s) at which to stop, as a regular expression. No checkpoints if blank; all checkpoints if ".*".
fields.name: stop

name: Script_command_setCheckpoints
